title: Executive Order 6138-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, California
content: It is hereby ordered that Executive Order No. 5166, dated July 26, 1929, which withdrew the public lands in Tps. 13 N., Rs. 16 and 17 E. of the Mount Diablo meridian, California, pending a resurvey, be, and the same is hereby, revoked.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6138-Revocation of Withdrawal of Public Lands Pending Resurvey, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361965
